title: "Diana is slated for the fire-themed skin from All Star" -Riot KateyKhaos
body:
> I agree that some of these champions definitely need more skins! 
> 
> Diana is slated for the fire-themed skin from All Star, so you can look forward to that in the coming months! 
> 
> Nasus received Archduke last year, Shaco received Wild Card, Talon received SSW, and Jax recently received Warden, for a bit of context there.
> 
> Malzahar is on the Champion Update list, so we won't be considering him for a skin until he's squared away. 
> 
> I would love to see a Karthus skin with particles, personally. And now that Sion has been updated (and his model and rig are so fresh and so clean, clean), I'd love to give him a higher tier skin that has all kinds of bells and whistles. His catalog of skins doesn't have a whole lot going on, as compared to some of the newer champions. D:


[Source](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/U3m2F05u-i-think-tryndamere-has-enough-skins-now?comment=0003)

Yay :3

replies.body: They announced this ages ago. There was a poll that went out for who the skin should go for. The options were diana, teemo, and i dont remember the third. I was hoping diana would win since a fire theme would be significantly different from her other skins.

> [{quoted}](name=Blue Kaozi,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=WO72rVUH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-05T20:04:29.411+0000)
>
> They announced this ages ago. There was a poll that went out for who the skin should go for. The options were diana, teemo, and i dont remember the third. I was hoping diana would win since a fire theme would be significantly different from her other skins.

Really? I never saw any poll... and I'm on the website more than I play League :I

It was the esports website, specifically the All Star voting site.

If you don't frequent that area of the site, I wouldn't be surprised if you didn't know about it.

> [{quoted}](name=Hellioning,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=WO72rVUH,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2016-02-06T03:03:42.133+0000)
>
> It was the esports website, specifically the All Star voting site.
> 
> If you don't frequent that area of the site, I wouldn't be surprised if you didn't know about it.

Yeah, I usually don't. Probably why. xD
Naut was the outer option (low key he got my vote) . I expect it to be a better wildfire skin

I really wonder what the teemo skin would have looked like. I think the effects on naut and diana would be much better, but I wonder what could have been done for the toxic little furball. It would be cool if they released concept art.

For everyone thinking about Diana's skin isn't coming, skins aren't made like "let's put some new particles there and there, let's put a special effect there and put some sounds there. Done". It's not like that, making a skin takes a while.
SION SKIN SION SKIN FOR NOXUSSSSSSSS {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}}
Mount Targon was mentioned to be getting a lore event this year, so maybe some time around then....
